replies.body:
Rooting for C9 to qualify for the gauntlet and make it through to worlds.

If they can manage to move past all the other teams by defeating them then it will be deserved.

Also its sad to see Meteos out right now but I do love the shotcalling from Hai.

if my math is correct they will qualify 100% for the gauntlet because with 70 points, they are under the best 6. they are lucky because 3 out of 6 teams in the playoffs dont have points from last split and its very likely TL takes #1 or #2 spot which will remove a big point contester
Whats the song at the beginning?
I love the whole series. I wish each segment 2-3X longer though.
Can you do this for some european players plz ;D ?
;A; the original C9 ;A; at least they are starting to get closer to looking like the old C9
Been a fan of C9 for at least 3 years im so glad they are staying in the LCS :)

Funny, because C9 with Hai, Meteos, Sneaky, Lemon and Balls is like 2 years old (add 2 months to that). And even before they started playing with the said roster, C9 (or TNN) existed for only half a year.
C9 are the best League of Legends team !!!

I wanna be the very best...

GO CLOUD NINE!

I wish I was like Sneaky.

"I don't think I'll ever get board with League of Legends"

The only substitute for Hai that ever worked out for them was Link, and he became free shortly after they already committed to Incarnation... X-P

If Hai really wants to quit playing for good going into next season, then the Hai's-lung-is-busted lineup is what I'd want to see in S6.  Though Incarnation has been pretty adequate once the shotcalling was in place.
of course the clip of the C9 vs CLG tie-breaker where Quickshot makes a random appearance makes the clip
Riot should do a series of the history of some of the older teams in NA and EU... Kappa
The date says this was added June 8th? Should fix that
I feel like his draven is missing. Sneaky, keep the good work up, ur the best.
first! also, "Over time, one thing thing" not proof read rito
